description:
Everyone`s about to start their life at Quest Dorm when Akane gets a mysterious android from her family in the shape of a girl named Ninjabayashi Ruri. Meanwhile, Hatagaya Academy`s student council president announces the start of a new event, a week long track meet, and then Mimori surprises everyone...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comptez sur moi, j`ai 99,9% de chance de gagner cette fête du sport
Leave It to Me, We Have a 99.9% Chance We`re Going to Win This Athletic Meet
Makasete Oke, Kono Taiikusai wa 99.9% no Kakuritsu de Oretachi no Kachi Da
دعوا الأمر لي، فوزنا في هذا المهرجان الرياضي مؤكد بنسبة 99.9%
任せておけ, この体育祭は99.9%の確率で俺たちの勝ちだ
